10224702919871441.subject: Your post includes information that was checked by independent fact-checkers.

messages.subject: We added a notice to your post with context in some locations
messages.message: It looks like you shared something that includes information third-party fact checkers say is false. Although you're based in a country whose fact-checking program has ended, your content may still be affected for people in other countries with active fact-checking programs. Learn more

messages.subject: We received the report you sent us
messages.message: Thank you, Brian, for taking the time to report this. We will review your report and check our Community Standards as soon as possible. We'll send you an update when your report has been reviewed. Keeping Messenger a safe, welcoming space is important to us.

messages.message: Thanks for letting us know about this. We reviewed the conversation that you reported and found that it doesn't go against any of our Community Standards We keep our review process as fair as possible by using the same Community Standards to review reports.
